method.name: get_ambient_light_color_correction
method.description: Gets the color correction in gamma space, which can be multiplied with a gamma corrected output color. Only valid if [method is_ambient_light_valid] returns [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_ambient_light_intensity
method.description: Gets the ambient light color in linear space, premultiplied with intensity (so values can be greater than [code]1.0[/code]). Only valid if [method is_ambient_light_valid] returns [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_directional_light_direction
method.description: Gets the direction of the directional light as a normalized vector. Only valid if [method is_directional_light_valid] returns [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_directional_light_intensity
method.description: Gets the directional light color in linear space, premultiplied with intensity (so values can be greater than [code]1.0[/code]). Only valid if [method is_directional_light_valid] returns [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_last_updated_time
method.description: Gets a value representing the last time the light estimation data was updated. This is can be used to check if the data has changed since the last time you checked.

method.name: get_spherical_harmonics_ambient_coefficients
method.description: Gets 9 spherical harmonics coefficients representing the environment light radiance, excluding the contribution from the directional light. Only valid if [method is_spherical_harmonics_ambient_valid] returns [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_spherical_harmonics_total_coefficients
method.description: Gets 9 spherical harmonics coefficients representing the environment light radiance, including the contribution from the directional light. Only valid if [method is_spherical_harmonics_total_valid] returns [code]true[/code].

method.name: is_ambient_light_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the current ambient light data is valid; otherwise, [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_directional_light_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the current directional light data is valid; otherwise, [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_estimate_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if any of the current data is valid; otherwise, [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_light_estimation_started
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if light estimation has successfully started; otherwise, [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_light_estimation_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if light estimation is supported on this headset; otherwise, [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_spherical_harmonics_ambient_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the current ambient spherical harmonics data is valid; otherwise, [code]false[/code].

method.name: is_spherical_harmonics_total_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the current total spherical harmonics data is valid; otherwise, [code]false[/code].

method.name: start_light_estimation
method.description: Attempts to start light estimation, and returns [code]true[/code] if successful.

members.member: Bitfield of all the types of light estimation data that will be queried when light estimation is running. If a light estimation type isn't OR'd into this field, then its data will always be invalid.

constants.constant: All available types of light estimation data.
